msbt.message: This is such a cool space to run laps in, but with how sound echoes I have to be MEGA quiet, .If Blathers ever found out I've been running in here, he'd get so angry
The art, the quiet, the others lost in thought This room is just about perfect for meditation, .
Everything in here is really, REALLY valuable, right? So maybe I should rethink the parkour,
Hey, so whaddaya think of 's art exhibit? Pretty buff, eh?
Sometimes I like to come in here and have a staring contest with a painting. .They always win, though.
Muscles can be art too, you know. I bet if mine weren't attached to me, they'd be on display in here.
I was out jogging when I found out they opened the art exhibit. I sprinted right over, .Only now I'm too winded to enjoy that new-exhibit smell
I've been thinking of taking up meditation, and this room feels perfect for it, .I figure my body's pretty strong, so why not work on my mind some!
They're going to let us lift the art, right?<10_4 /> I've heard some of it's gonna be REALLY heavy, !
